Title: Electromagnetic induction imaging with atomic magnetometers
Abstract: © 2016 OSA.We report on the development and performance of an electromagnetic induction imaging system based on atomic magnetometers.We discuss, and demonstrate experimentally, potential applications of our system in the security, industrial, and biomedical fields.
